Author: SpheneDev
Name: Sphene
Description: Through the power of Living Memory, this plugin harmonizes your Penumbra modifications and Glamourer configurations across all connected souls, ensuring endless synchronization in your shared digital realm.
Punchline: Become Endless. Return to Living Memory.
Changelog:
- Add the Sphene Image Cropper browser link to the profile edit page, including a security notice.
- Implement a table-based layout to improve the organisation and display of the profile editor.
- The client update notification now appears as a hint in CompactUI and as an icon indicator on the draggable Sphene icon.
- Add a toast notification to alert users when a new version is available.
